text: Old Boston Colliery baths Old Boston was a colliery in the north of Haydock, Merseyside, England. The colliery was closed, due to an underground fire. The site of the colliery was then used for many years as a training centre for National Coal Board employees. The site of the colliery and training centre is now Old Boston Trading estate, located adjacent to the A580 East Lancashire road. ==References== Category:Towns and villages in the Metropolitan Borough of St Helens
